body.p: The Board regards this argument as unsound, because it overlooks that:

li.p: every time an entity receives resources as consideration for the issue of equity instruments, there is no outflow of cash or other assets, and on every other occasion the resources received as consideration for the issue of equity instruments are recognised in the financial statements; and
the expense arises from the consumption of those resources, not from an outflow of assets.
